channel.title: Beta Preperations

item.title: Beta Preperations
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“The Enforcer, post:4, topic:427755”]How about you guys also use MSN/Skype for communication? Otherwize beta preparations will take 6 months.

EDIT:
I haven’t checked/ran the source myself, but according to some people it’s real buggy right now. Sure you want to launch the beta with a shitload of bugs? Considering that in the previous stage not much was done here.[/quote]

unless people are running it wrong? didn’t seem buggy at all to me, if the sql stuff is still implemented and working then i don’t see any problems. (as i couldn’t test that part due to running a different storage medium)

Read full topic

item.title: Beta Preperations
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Motaro, post:11, topic:427755”]In my opinion, mods shouldn’t be known or recognized by the players. I think that if this server wants to be big, then the admins should take the same approach Jagex did. No mods teleporting people or talking over global chat. Mods were and still are a rare sight in-game.

I think it makes the game more playable and enjoyable.[/quote]

I agree that mods shouldn’t have any powers that they don’t absolutely need. I think all of that is taken care of in the configuration already. There certainly shouldn’t be teleporting of players and such.

Read full topic

item.title: Beta Preperations
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Motaro, post:11, topic:427755”]In my opinion, mods shouldn’t be known or recognized by the players. I think that if this server wants to be big, then the admins should take the same approach Jagex did. No mods teleporting people or talking over global chat. Mods were and still are a rare sight in-game.

I think it makes the game more playable and enjoyable.[/quote]
The reason why you never see mods on RS is that there are about 1000x more players than we have, and about 150 worlds.

Read full topic

item.title: Beta Preperations
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

In my opinion, mods shouldn’t be known or recognized by the players. I think that if this server wants to be big, then the admins should take the same approach Jagex did. No mods teleporting people or talking over global chat. Mods were and still are a rare sight in-game.

I think it makes the game more playable and enjoyable.

item.title: Beta Preperations
item.dc:creator: @The_Enforcer The Enforcer
item.description:
@The_Enforcer wrote:

I’ll be an admin, because I dislike botters.

EDIT: If possible I would offer to run my optimization program (as a root user) on the server. It only needs to be ran once, from then on it’s optimized as fuck.

Read full topic

item.title: Beta Preperations
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:7, topic:427755”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=530447.msg3873767#msg3873767 date=1325526583]

Server Settings :
Xp Rate : 4x
Type : F2P (Skills and World)
Combat Formula : RSCA Latest
Worlds : 1 (at start)
Bug reporters receive : beta player icon in game…
After beta : wipe
Mods :
Eh ill just write up my own list (no specific order): CFF (obv), Vrunk, xEnt, Pets, K09, MITB, Lothy, Jorgen, Necroth and those rs2 forum moderators who were interested.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[/quote]I don’t want to be a mod.[/quote]

item.title: Beta Preperations
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:3, topic:427755”]I thought most of this was already agreed on. Here is how I imagined it:

F2P because, like you said, we can go to P2P later.

2x for now because it’s easier to increase later than to decrease later.

@Admins/mods, I don’t know, suggestions?

I don’t see why there should be more than 1 world for now?

I guess your bug system could work, any ideas as to the incentive? Maybe just a special item (like a party hat)? That is if they report bugs on github right?

Also, the database is being cleared after the beta, right? (account names/passwords are stored in the forum anyhow, so they will be safe)[/quote]

Theres no need for more than 1 World, The community just isnt big enough to spread the player count over more than 1 World, Maybe when you decide to implement 2 Worlds, Implement World 2 as P2P for Subscribers only? This also keeps the server funded for those that want to use the P2P facility.

I would agree on a complete DB of the Beta once its ready to be properly released.

Read full topic

item.title: Beta Preperations
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I thought most of this was already agreed on. Here is how I imagined it:

F2P because, like you said, we can go to P2P later.

2x for now because it’s easier to increase later than to decrease later.

@Admins/mods, I don’t know, suggestions?

I don’t see why there should be more than 1 world for now?

I guess your bug system could work, any ideas as to the incentive? Maybe just a special item (like a party hat)? That is if they report bugs on github right?

Also, the database is being cleared after the beta, right? (account names/passwords are stored in the forum anyhow, so they will be safe)

Read full topic

item.title: Beta Preperations
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:1, topic:427755”]Since it seems we are almost at beta, we really need to work out rates & rules.

Unsure who makes the ultimate decision of the XP rates of the server, and game type (F2P or P2P) but were at the time when it needs to be set in stone.

@MITB: F2P or P2P?

imo going F2P allows room to go P2P later on, but it will cause too much damage the other way around.

@MITB: XP Rates?

I know you, and lots of people want RSC-like rates, imo 1x is just too long, 2x at the minimum, but i personally think 2.5x is the sweet spot.

@MITB: Admins? Mods? or even put someone in charge of making decisions if you don’t want to

@MITB: how many worlds?

During beta, people will just play, i have not seen a beta where people actually report bugs or try to find them, which makes a lot of launches bug riddled.

20x XP rates for a 2 weeks beta, and for each bug found/reported they get some sort of reward when the game goes live (incentive to find bugs and get them fixed for a smooth launch)

also if im missing anything important that needs to be added please post it.[/quote]

I agree with all the above, During the beta it will be good to give people an incentive to find and report bugs.

As for XP Rates I would like to see 1x but 2-2.5 is more than reasonable but no higher than 2.5

Read full topic

item.title: Beta Preperations
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

Since it seems we are almost at beta, we really need to work out rates & rules.

Unsure who makes the ultimate decision of the XP rates of the server, and game type (F2P or P2P) but were at the time when it needs to be set in stone.

@MITB: F2P or P2P?

imo going F2P allows room to go P2P later on, but it will cause too much damage the other way around.

@MITB: XP Rates?

I know you, and lots of people want RSC-like rates, imo 1x is just too long, 2x at the minimum, but i personally think 2.5x is the sweet spot.

@MITB: Admins? Mods? or even put someone in charge of making decisions if you don’t want to

@MITB: how many worlds?

During beta, people will just play, i have not seen a beta where people actually report bugs or try to find them, which makes a lot of launches bug riddled.

20x XP rates for a 2 weeks beta, and for each bug found/reported they get some sort of reward when the game goes live (incentive to find bugs and get them fixed for a smooth launch)

also if im missing anything important that needs to be added please post it.

Read full topic
